angularBeans.context

Class AngularBeansCDIExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • angularBeans.context.AngularBeansCDIExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.enterprise.inject.spi.Extension

    public class AngularBeansCDIExtension
extends Object
implements javax.enterprise.inject.spi.Extension
    AngularBeans CDI Extension implementation to observe application deployment and components scan
    Author:
    Bessem Hmidi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AngularBeansCDIExtension() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void processAnnotatedType(javax.enterprise.inject.spi.ProcessAnnotatedType<T> processAnnotatedType)
      Observe the ProcessAnnotatedType event and register scanned angularBeans specific CDI beans (applications (ng module), extensions and angularBeans beans) to the BeanRegistry that will be used in the angularBeans script (js) generation
      void registerContext(javax.enterprise.inject.spi.AfterBeanDiscovery event, javax.enterprise.inject.spi.BeanManager manager)
      auto called method that observe the beans discovery at deployment, register the NGSessionScopeContext (and the NGSessionScoped custom CDI scope)

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
